title: Planorama
DESCRIPTION: Select the language you prefer to use.
login_title: A new way to plan your appointments
email_associado: Enter the email associated with your account to recover your password.
insira_codigo: Enter the code that was sent to your email:
digite_senha_description: Enter your new password to reset access to your account.
validar_senha: Password 8 and 12 characters, at least 1 uppercase letter, 1 lowercase letter, 1 symbol and 1 number.
termos_descricao: Welcome to our app. These terms of use govern your use of the app and its services. Please read them carefully.
termos_aceitacao_description: By accessing or using the Platform in any way, you agree to comply with these Terms of Use and all policies and guidelines incorporated by reference. If you do not agree with these terms, please do not use the app.
termos_privacidade_description: By using the app, you acknowledge and agree to the collection, use, and disclosure of your personal information in accordance with our Privacy Policy. This information may include, but is not limited to, your name, email, and phone number.
termos_responsabilidade_description: You are solely responsible for all activities conducted through your account on the app. Sharing your password or allowing third parties to access your account is prohibited.
termos_propriedade_intelectual_descripti: All content available on the App, including text, images, videos, graphics, logos, trademarks, software, and other materials, is owned by the app or its licensors and is protected by intellectual property laws.
termos_restricoes_description: You agree not to use the app for any illegal or unauthorized purposes, nor violate any laws in your jurisdiction. You also agree not to access or attempt to access protected areas of the app, nor interfere with its operation or security.
termos_modificacoes_description: We reserve the right to modify these Terms of Use at any time, with reasonable prior notice. Continued use of the app after such modifications are posted will constitute your acceptance of the new terms.
termos_rescisao_description: We may terminate or suspend your account and access to the app immediately, without prior notice or liability, for any reason, including breach of these Terms of Use.
selecionar_cor: Select a color to match your label
obs_repetir: Note: Repeat will only occur between the selected start and end dates.
criar_descricao: Fill in the fields to create your account.
